statements: SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Project WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM Project WHERE JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(team_members) > 5;
SELECT project_name FROM Project WHERE start_date > '2022-03-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM Project;
SELECT * FROM Project WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM Project WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, team_members FROM Project WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Project ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE team_members ->> 'team_lead' = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, team_id FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, location, team_lead FROM teams WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM teams ORDER BY team_name ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, location FROM teams WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT project_id, project_name, team_id FROM projects WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT project_name FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM teams WHERE start_date > '2021-06-01';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE project_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT project_name, end_date, team_members->>'team_lead' AS team_lead FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE status='in_progress' ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, milestone, project_timeline.timeline_date FROM projects JOIN project_timeline ON projects.project_id = project_timeline.project_id WHERE milestone LIKE '%launch%';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE status='In Progress';
SELECT task_id, task_name, project_id FROM tasks ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, COUNT(*) FROM projects GROUP BY project_id, project_name;
SELECT timeline_date, milestone, description FROM project_timeline WHERE timeline_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, deadline, team_id FROM tasks WHERE project_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT project_id, progress_status FROM progress WHERE update_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM teams WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, status FROM tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT member_name, email FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT project_id, task_id, update_description FROM progress_updates WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC, project_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_id, task_name, assigned_to FROM tasks WHERE status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY project_id, task_name;
SELECT member_name, role, email FROM team_members WHERE role IN ('Developer', 'Designer') ORDER BY member_name;
SELECT project_id, timeline_id, start_date, end_date FROM timelines JOIN projects ON timelines.project_id = projects.project_id WHERE end_date >= '2022-12-01';
